items.body_markdown:
For a random graph, G, on n vertices's, each possible edge is present independently with probability k, 0 <= k <= 1.
        
    I seek P(all edges between these vertices's are present in G)
    My thoughts so far
        
    If we have the empty subset, p = 1
    If we have a one element set, p = 1
    If we have a two element set, p = k
    If we have a three element set, p = k^3
    If we have a four element st, p = k^6
    If we have a five element set, p = k^10.
        
    If the above is correct, then I can capture the probability as the following:  P = k^(n C 2)

However, this only works for two - five element set. If I have a
    one or two element set the following if incorrect. If I am understanding everything correctly up to this point, how can I capture the other two cases?

Is the only possibility a piecewise defined function?
If n=0 or n = 1, 1
Otherwise, k^(n C 2)
items.title: For a subset of 5 vertices find P(all edges between these vertices are present in G)
items.body:
For a random graph, G, on n vertices's, each possible edge is present independently with probability k, 0 <= k <= 1.

I seek P(all edges between these vertices's are present in G)
My thoughts so far

If we have the empty subset, p = 1
If we have a one element set, p = 1
If we have a two element set, p = k
If we have a three element set, p = k^3
If we have a four element st, p = k^6
If we have a five element set, p = k^10.

If the above is correct, then I can capture the probability as the following:  P = k^(n C 2)

However, this only works for two - five element set. If I have a one or two element set the following if incorrect. If I am understanding everything correctly up to this point, how can I capture the other two cases?

Is the only possibility a piecewise defined function? If n=0 or n = 1, 1 Otherwise, k^(n C 2)

items.body_markdown:
Recently my wordpress site got hacked and i solved it by reinstalling the backup version of wp-content folder and also running and repairing wordfence plugin in the site. But my website is showing an error with 500 and when i found the problem was with aws-autoloader.php file. This aws-autoloader.php is replaced with aws-autoloader.php suspected file because of which the site is not loading:

/var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/amazon-web-services/vendor/aws/aws-autoloader.php

The file is getting renamed to aws-autoloader.php.suspected.

Any suggestions or opinions to fix this issue?

I have created a network using 4 switches,host h1 and host h2 in mininet using python script. I can add/delete flows for the switches from here using python/dpctl... commands, so that traffic can be changed(pinging h1 to h2 will take root according to flows of switches  present in mininet).

   

  

    I have to do it from java API through OpenDayLight Controller.
    i.e to add flows to OpenDayLight Controller and somehow this
    ODL controller send these flows to mininet. 
    I can see my added flow in ODL Controller UI but mininet does not 
    have the flow added in ODL.

Above paragraph seems messy, so i am breaking it into parts ...

1.The connection b/w mininet and ODL looks fine as when i run scripts in mininet after that i can see the 4 switches and h1,h2 in ODL UI i.e ip:8080

2.I am adding flow using this url for switch 1   /controller/nb/v2/flowprogrammer/default/node/OF/00:00:00:00:00:00:00:01/staticFlow/flow1  The reference for it is [here](https://jenkins.opendaylight.org/controller/job/controller-merge/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/opendaylight/northbound/flowprogrammer/target/site/wsdocs/resource_FlowProgrammerNorthbound.html)

3.When added flows can be seen in ODL UI but has no affects on mininet.

4.As i configure network in mininet using python, it initiates traffic with rout h1->s1->s4->h2. So basically i don't have the name of flows for switch s1 and s4 hence not able to delete it( By the way i am not at all able to reach mininet through ODL)

 

    So i am not able to add a flow to switch s1/s4(even in ODL) 
    with port already in use with initial traffic h1->s1->s4->h2.

Apart from this i am able to add flows to ODL (Not reflected in mininet)

Could anyone please guide or suggest relevant tutorial to understand and solve this problem, i found many tutorial on web but not related to this.
Thanks in Advance.
P.S: Please ask if more information is required... I am a beginner so don't have idea about the information needed to get the problem accurately...
items.title: How to add/delete flows of switches in mininet using OpenDayLight Controller?
items.body:
I have created a network using 4 switches,host h1 and host h2 in mininet using python script. I can add/delete flows for the switches from here using python/dpctl... commands, so that traffic can be changed(pinging h1 to h2 will take root according to flows of switches present in mininet).

I have to do it from java API through OpenDayLight Controller.
i.e to add flows to OpenDayLight Controller and somehow this
ODL controller send these flows to mininet. 
I can see my added flow in ODL Controller UI but mininet does not 
have the flow added in ODL.

Above paragraph seems messy, so i am breaking it into parts ...

1.The connection b/w mininet and ODL looks fine as when i run scripts in mininet after that i can see the 4 switches and h1,h2 in ODL UI i.e ip:8080

2.I am adding flow using this url for switch 1 /controller/nb/v2/flowprogrammer/default/node/OF/00:00:00:00:00:00:00:01/staticFlow/flow1 The reference for it is here

3.When added flows can be seen in ODL UI but has no affects on mininet.

4.As i configure network in mininet using python, it initiates traffic with rout h1->s1->s4->h2. So basically i don't have the name of flows for switch s1 and s4 hence not able to delete it( By the way i am not at all able to reach mininet through ODL)

So i am not able to add a flow to switch s1/s4(even in ODL) 
with port already in use with initial traffic h1->s1->s4->h2.

Apart from this i am able to add flows to ODL (Not reflected in mininet)

Could anyone please guide or suggest relevant tutorial to understand and solve this problem, i found many tutorial on web but not related to this. Thanks in Advance. P.S: Please ask if more information is required... I am a beginner so don't have idea about the information needed to get the problem accurately...

items.title: WPF C# - Align column and Group headers
items.body:
I currently have a data grid with groups as such:

I want to achieve the below in WPF:

Now, the solution suggested in the following article: https://leeontech.wordpress.com/2010/03/25/summary-rows-in-datagrid-with-multiple-groups/

  1. Make 4 columns as datagrid cells in the Group Styler
  2. Add events in code behind to make sure the resizing is done of the group style headers with data grid sizes.

I cannot translate the events code to WPF from SL4:

 datagrid1.LayoutUpdated += new EventHandler(datagrid1_LayoutUpdated);

 datagrid1.UnloadingRowGroup += (s, e) => { Resize(); };
 datagrid1.LoadingRowGroup += (s, e) => { refreshUI = true; };

 void datagrid1_LayoutUpdated(object sender, EventArgs e)
 {
     if (refreshUI && headers == null)
     {
         dghc = datagrid1.GetChildrenByType<DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter>().FirstOrDefault();
         foreach (DataGridColumnHeader dgch in dghc.Children)
         {
             dgch.SizeChanged += (s, args) => { Resize(); };
         }
     }

     if (refreshUI)
         Resize();

     refreshUI = false;
 }

void Resize()
{
   headers = datagrid1.GetChildrenByType<StackPanel>().Where(x => x.Name == “ghsp”).ToList();
   headers.ForEach(x =>
   {               
      for (int i = 1; i < dghc.Children.Count – 2; i++)                                                      
         (x.Children[i – 1] as DataGridCell).Width = dghc.Children[i].RenderSize.Width;                                                                                  
   });
}

Datagrid.UnloadingGroup doesn't seem to exist for WPF and DataGrid.GetChildrenByTypes does not exist either.

Can someone help convert this into WPF events?

items.title: Advanced Custom Field Filter Wordpress
items.body:
Could someone please explain why the first section of code works but not the second. I am trying to filter the content on a website based on what values have been selected in the backend on each post using Advanced Custom Fields.

function my_pre_get_posts( $query ) {
// do not modify queries in the admin
if( is_admin() ) {
    return $query;
}

// only modify queries for 'event' post type
if( isset($query->query_vars['post_type']) && $query->query_vars['post_type'] == 'property' ) {
    // allow the url to alter the query
    if( isset($_GET['bedrooms']) ) {
        $query->set('meta_key', 'bedrooms');
        $query->set('meta_value', $_GET['bedrooms']);
    } 
}
// return
return $query;

}

add_action('pre_get_posts', 'my_pre_get_posts');

non working: 

add_action('pre_get_posts', 'my_pre_get_posts');

function my_pre_get_posts( $query ) {
// bail early if is in admin
if( is_admin() ){
    return;
} 


// get meta query
$meta_query = $query->get('meta_query');

if( isset($_GET['bedrooms']) ){
    $meta_query[] = array(
        'key'        => 'bedrooms',
        'value'      => $_GET['bedrooms'],
        'compare'    => '=',
    );
}

// update meta query
$query->set('meta_query', $meta_query);

return;
}

items.body_markdown:
I am wanting to initially bind a Kendo UI spreadsheet to an empty datasource so the user is presented with an empty sheet. However I am running into this issue: 

>The data of the DataSource to which the Spreadsheet will be bound has to contain data items. Binding the widget to a DataSource with empty data leads to undesired side effects.

Is there any known workaround to this issue?

items.body_markdown:
I would like to programmatically create a Bokeh server application that includes static files.  As mentioned in [the server docs](https://bokeh.pydata.org/en/latest/docs/user_guide/server.html) I know that when using the `bokeh serve` command line application I can arrange a directory with the `/serve` directory.  How do I accomplish this directly when creating a `bokeh.server.server.Server` object?

    from bokeh.server.server import Server
    server = Server(..., static_path=...)

This is somewhat similar to [this question](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/38479973/how-to-set-static-path-in-tornado) on using static paths with Tornado applications
items.title: Create programmatic bokeh server application with static files
items.body:
I would like to programmatically create a Bokeh server application that includes static files. As mentioned in the server docs I know that when using the bokeh serve command line application I can arrange a directory with the /serve directory. How do I accomplish this directly when creating a bokeh.server.server.Server object?

from bokeh.server.server import Server
server = Server(..., static_path=...)

This is somewhat similar to this question on using static paths with Tornado applications

items.title: Update value of IDbCommand's parameters
items.body:
I want to update value of IDbCommand parameters when it does exist already

    public void AddParameter(IDbCommand command, string name, object value)
    {
        var parameter = command.CreateParameter();
        parameter.ParameterName = "@" + name;
        parameter.Value = value;
        command.Parameters.Add(parameter);
    }

I tried adding this to my method but it doesn't work for IDBCommand, because it's a SqlCommand option.

if (command.Parameters.Contains("@" + name))
{
     command.Parameters["@" + name].Value = value;
}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

    </licenses>
    <scm>
        <developerConnection>scm:git|git@github.com:plutext/docx4j.git</developerConnection>

      </properties> 


    <build>
            <sourceDirectory>src/main/java</sourceDirectory>

                    <verbose>false</verbose>

items.body_markdown:
I have a question about a simple fit function in Python.
I am trying to fit two different functions on a data set and the border between the two regimes should be also a fit parameter.
Very naively I was trying something like this:

    def FitFunc(x, a, b, c, d, e, border):
        if x < border:
            return a * x + b
        if x > border:
            return c * x**2 + d * x + e

But I got a ValueError: 

> The truth value of a Series is ambiguous. Use a.empty(), a.bool(), a.item(), a.any() or a.all()

I understand that you can not compare my x array to an integer value (which is not even assigned to a fixed value, this should be done by the curve_fit procedure).

I was not able to find a solution for this supposedly simple problem. Can someone help me out of this?

Thanks in advance!

EDIT: I constructed an example:
[![Constructed example][1]][1]
For the data with x<5 this is perfectly described by a linear function (y=x-3), For x>5 this is perfectly described by a square function (y=x**2/5-3*x/5). Assume you don't know that x is the perfect 'border', is there a way to let curve_fit find out?


  [1]: https://i.stack.imgur.com/JEfIL.png
items.title: Fit of two different functions with boarder as fit parameter
items.body:
I have a question about a simple fit function in Python. I am trying to fit two different functions on a data set and the border between the two regimes should be also a fit parameter. Very naively I was trying something like this:

def FitFunc(x, a, b, c, d, e, border):
    if x < border:
        return a * x + b
    if x > border:
        return c * x**2 + d * x + e

But I got a ValueError:

The truth value of a Series is ambiguous. Use a.empty(), a.bool(), a.item(), a.any() or a.all()

I understand that you can not compare my x array to an integer value (which is not even assigned to a fixed value, this should be done by the curve_fit procedure).

I was not able to find a solution for this supposedly simple problem. Can someone help me out of this?

Thanks in advance!

EDIT: I constructed an example: For the data with x<5 this is perfectly described by a linear function (y=x-3), For x>5 this is perfectly described by a square function (y=x**2/5-3*x/5). Assume you don't know that x is the perfect 'border', is there a way to let curve_fit find out?

items.title: How to force MySQL to take 0 as a valid auto-increment value
items.body:
Long story short, I have a SQL file that I want to import as a skel style file, so this will be done repeatedly, programmatically. I can edit the SQL file however I want, but I'd rather not touch the application itself.

This application uses userid = 0 to represent the anonymous user. It also has a relevant (blank) entry in the database to represent this 'user'. Hence, the line in my skel.sql looks something like this:

INSERT INTO `{{TABLE_PREFIX}}users` VALUES (0, '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, '', '', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, NULL, '', '', '', NULL);

The problem with this is that uid is a auto_increment field, for which, technically, 0 is an invalid value. Or atleast, if you set it to 0, you're basically telling MySQL, "Please insert the next id into this field."

Now, I suppose I could put an INSERT then an UPDATE query into my SQL file, but is there a way of telling MySQL in general that yes, I actually want to insert 0 into this field?

        void onFragmentInteraction(Uri uri);
    }
